create.description: API tokens allow third-party services to authenticate with our application on your behalf.
create.title: Create API Token

manage.description: You may delete any of your existing tokens if they are no longer needed.
manage.title: Manage API Tokens

modal_created.content: Please copy your new API token. For your security, it won't be shown again.
modal_created.title: API Token Created

modal_delete.content: Are you sure you would like to delete this API token? THIS ACTION CANNOT BE UNDONE.
modal_delete.title: Delete API Token

interactions_events.events_deleted: All events for :name have been deleted.
interactions_events.interaction_sent: Your message ":message" will be sent the next time the addon connects to the Minionway server, which can take up to 30 seconds.
interactions_events.interactions_deleted: All interactions for :name have been deleted.

settings.character_deleted: The character :name has been deleted from your account
settings.content: Once this character is deleted, all of its data will be permanently deleted. You can add it again by starting the addon while playing this character.
settings.delete_character_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Once your account is deleted, all of data will be permanently deleted. THIS ACTION CANNOT BE UNDONE.
settings.delete_character_instructions: Please enter your full Discord handle, :handle to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.
settings.description: Permanently delete :name from your account
settings.title: Delete :name from your account

retainer_sales.do_search_first: Nothing yet. Do a search first.
retainer_sales.no_result: There are no sales to display for the selected time period.

delete_account.content: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
delete_account.delete_account_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. THIS ACTION CANNOT BE UNDONE.
delete_account.delete_account_instructions: Please enter your full Discord handle, :handle to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.

other_sessions.content: If necessary, you may log out of all of your other browser sessions across all of your devices. Some of your recent sessions are listed below; however, this list may not be exhaustive. If you feel your account has been compromised, you should also update your Discord password.
other_sessions.description: Manage and log out your active sessions on other browsers and devices.

modal_confirmation.content: Please enter your full Discord handle, :discord_handle to confirm you would like to log out of your other browser sessions across all of your devices.
modal_confirmation.title: Log Out Other Browser Sessions

other_sessions.terminated: Your other sessions have been terminated.
other_sessions.title: Browser Sessions

preferences.time_zone_description: When dates are displayed, show them in this timezone.
preferences.title: Preferences

auth.discord_not_allowed: You are not allowed to login.

footer.line2: Minionway.com and the Minionway logo are ©:year Minionway Software. The Minionway logo was created by the incredibly talented MABerube.

translation_in_progress.text: Translation of Minionway is done by the community. If you want to help, join #translation in our Discord.

block1.text: Take your FFXIV game to the next level with Minionway. Monitor your characters, interact with players, keep an eye on your retainer' sales and much more!

block2.header: There's no easier way to stay connected!
block2.text: Here are a few reasons why you should use Minionway:

currently_in_alpha.text: Minionway is available on invite only for the moment. Interested? Join us on Discord!

dominate_market.text: Monitor every sale your retainers makes. Generate and export reports.

dont_miss_a_thing.text: Keep an eye on your minion in real-time and make sure it's always productive.

follow_conversation.text: See what's happening around you, in your Free Company or in your Linkshells.

integrates.text: Works with every other FFXIVMinion addons. You can even monitor/control some of them directly in Minionway.

reply_back.text: Send a message or reply to any /say, /fc, /tell and more.

stay_informed.text: Get notified on Discord or via email for the events that matters to you.

welcome.title: Minionway - Take your FFXIV game to the next level!
